title: Tandoori Mushroom
body: Fresh button mushroom marinated with dried fenugreek, mustard oil and yoghurt..

title: Paneer Tikka
body: Grilled cubes of cottage cheese marinated in mint, yoghurt, ginger and spices.

title: Vegetarian Grill
body: Grilled assortment of the Chef's choicest vegetarian barbecue

title: Murgh Tikka
body: Morsels of chicken marinated in yoghurt and spices, char grilled in the tandoor.

title: Malmali Seekh Kebab
body: Minced lamb delicately seasoned and grilled to perfection

title: Tandoori Salmon
body: Fresh salmon marinated in traditional Indian spices, grilled to perfection.

title: Kebab Platter
body: Grilled assortment of the chef's choicest barbecues.

title: Tandoori Kaliyan
body: Broccoli and cauliflower florets marinated and grilled.

title: Tandoori Soya
body: Juicy soya chunks subtly spiced and grilled. An original Bombay Palace specialty

title: Murgh Malai Kebab
body: Chicken breast marinated in cardamom, mace and sun dried fenugreek.

title: Changezi Champen
body: Juicy lamb cutlets marinated in fresh mint, fennel, pepper and yoghurt.

title: Jhinga Lajawab
body: Jumbo prawns marinated in natural herbs, roasted in clay oven.
